statements: DELETE FROM Locations WHERE location_id = 100 AND location_name = 'New York';
DELETE FROM Locations WHERE location_name = 'Los Angeles' OR warehouse_capacity < 500;
DELETE FROM Inventory WHERE inventory_id = 100 AND location_id = 1;
DELETE FROM InventoryMovements WHERE movement_id = 50 AND from_location_id = 2;
DELETE FROM Inventory WHERE product_name = 'Laptop' AND quantity < 10;
DELETE FROM Warehouse WHERE location_id = 3 AND warehouse_name = 'Main Warehouse';
DELETE FROM Inventory WHERE quantity < 10 AND location_id = 2;
DELETE FROM Inventory WHERE quantity <= 0 OR location_id IS NULL;
DELETE FROM Movement WHERE from_location_id = 2 AND to_location_id = 4;
